labels.analysis: The MCP ServerContext7 primarily enhances code accuracy and productivity by fetching up-to-date, version-specific code documentation and examples directly from the source. It eliminates outdated code, hallucinated APIs, and generic answers by integrating real-time library documentation into coding workflows. The available tools, 'resolve-library-id' and 'get-library-docs,' work together to retrieve precise documentation by first resolving a general package name into a Context7-compatible library ID and then fetching the actual documentation.
labels.reasoning: The primary label, 'Development Tools,' was chosen because the server is designed to aid in software development by enhancing coding workflows with accurate, up-to-date documentation. The secondary label, 'AI/ML Tools,' is relevant since the server's context enrichment features are likely intended to improve the performance of AI-powered coding assistants. The custom label, 'Code Documentation Integration,' was added because this is a unique feature that isn't fully covered by the predefined labels.

tools.name: resolve-library-id
tools.description: Required first step: Resolves a general package name into a Context7-compatible library ID. Must be called before using 'get-library-docs' to retrieve a valid Context7-compatible library ID.

libraryName.description: Library name to search for and retrieve a Context7-compatible library ID.

tools.name: get-library-docs
tools.description: Fetches up-to-date documentation for a library. You must call 'resolve-library-id' first to obtain the exact Context7-compatible library ID required to use this tool.

context7CompatibleLibraryID.description: Exact Context7-compatible library ID (e.g., 'mongodb/docs', 'vercel/nextjs') retrieved from 'resolve-library-id'.

tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens of documentation to retrieve (default: 5000). Higher values provide more context but consume more tokens.

server_info_crawled.name: Context7

server_info_crawled.overview: Fetch up-to-date, version-specific code documentation and examples directly from the source to enhance your LLM prompts. Eliminate outdated code, hallucinated APIs, and generic answers by integrating real-time library docs into your coding assistant workflow. Improve code accuracy and productivity with seamless context enrichment.

libraryName.description: Library name to search for and retrieve a Context7-compatible library ID.

tools.name: get-library-docs
tools.description: Fetches up-to-date documentation for a library. You must call 'resolve-library-id' first to obtain the exact Context7-compatible library ID required to use this tool.

context7CompatibleLibraryID.description: Exact Context7-compatible library ID (e.g., 'mongodb/docs', 'vercel/nextjs') retrieved from 'resolve-library-id'.

tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens of documentation to retrieve (default: 5000). Higher values provide more context but consume more tokens.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@decvb/context7/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
